website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone 6 is the right iPhone, at the right size, for right now.
pros: Easiest smartphone OS, with the best third-party apps
cons: Phone calling performance is just okay

customer_reviews.title: Received in great condition and pretty much as new
customer_reviews.text: Received in great condition and pretty much as new. Only reservation is, I got zero paper work with the mobile - no payment receipt, warranty, set-up instructions, nothing. I guess this is ok, but it would be useful to include these documents to help get you started and for future reference.
customer_reviews.author: Brett P.

customer_reviews.title: Smashed but works
customer_reviews.text: The product was very cheap for what it is, so it's not a surprise that it wouldn't have its hitches. The phone, although it came with fast delivery, was very smashed, which was upsetting. However, everything worked fine with it and paying to get the screen repaired will still total it to less than an iPhone actually cost. Just bear in mind that when you buy this you run the risk of receiving a very smashed phone. I am still not happy with the state it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: SorrelWilkes

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Mobile arrived on time and locks great. After about 10 weeks the Battery dies very quickly. From fully loaded to less then 50 % in about 20 minutes is for a refurbished iPhone not very good. Unfortunately this mobile was a gift for my grandson in Germany. He took it to an Apple certified service shop and they said the battery needs to be replaced. The question is, would you pay for replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like it. Came on time
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son after Samsung refused to mend his 6 month old A3 under warranty. He seems to like it. Came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from products
customer_reviews.text: Not the amount of memory seller says and constantly restarting 👊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Phone was in better condition than I expected. Delivered on time. Excellent value. My son was very happy with it for his birthday present
customer_reviews.author: Saz42

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FORM THIS SELLER - Had the phone not even 8 weeks at the top right hand the word "searching" appeared did all the usual test phone does not work complete waste of a phone cant get a refund as the guarentee was only 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for long
customer_reviews.text: Only had phone a couple of months and sound went not very helpful wouldn’t by another phone from this site
customer_reviews.author: Gary james lyon

customer_reviews.title: As good as a brand new phone
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my boyfriend as he broke his and need a quick replacement. Quick service. Excellent value for money. Does the job as good as a brand new phone. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Avoid Avoid!!
customer_reviews.text: Battery was really bad and it wouldn't even last 2 hour on full charge. It would have helped if they said it had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: BIsshu

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend, I made a purchase, the product was defective and I am still waiting for the money back. And they do not give a reason for the delay!
customer_reviews.author: Nuno Viana

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Phone was sold as used but as new.But was very very slow.Apparently a common problem with iphones.Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: niamhhogg

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: As expected, screen very clear with good touch. Nice size
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone very intuitive which makes every day tasks so much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The phone came just as described with very little wear. Overall, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Neath

customer_reviews.title: ... a new battery but other than that everything was good
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a new battery but other than that everything was good
customer_reviews.author: Omar johnson

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, 5*
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Phone came with a few minor scratches on the corners but not really noticeable. Product runs perfectly as it should. Very happy with what I got for the price I paid. Would highly recommmend. Was bought as an Xmas present, and both me and the person I gave it to are extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cal198

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They send as a unlock unfortunately it was locked in EE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was fine
customer_reviews.text: The phone is as expected. Works fine in good condition. Delivery service not the best
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: phone came and the phone was bent, 3 screens ...
customer_reviews.text: phone came and the phone was bent, 3 screens have come off in 2 months due to this, awful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Locks itself as soon as you try get it working, not accurate to product title.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a very good phone, and was delivered before the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Nduwimana

customer_reviews.title: perfect product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Got it the following day, perfect product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone is locked to previous owner, as a code ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone is locked to previous owner, as a code or password is required I am unable to use it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doge guy phone battery no good he is lying phone good condition
customer_reviews.text: Doge guy phone battery no good he is lying phone good condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Phone was described as very good condition, like new. I checked the phone worked and wrapped it for Xmas. On Xmas day my son showed me his phone and it had dents in the back. Had I noticed this I would have sent the phone back.
customer_reviews.author: carla Burnham

customer_reviews.title: NOT unlocked after all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! Despite Pocket Rocket describing this product as unlocked I just put my EE sim in and the phone is locked 😁. Great! Thanks Pocket Rocket!
customer_reviews.author: Mum-of-3

customer_reviews.title: The antenna didn't work and it also broke very easily, after just sitting with it in my back ...
customer_reviews.text: The antenna didn't work and it also broke very easily, after just sitting with it in my back pocket it has bent beyond repair and now they won't respond to my email about this. Besides this good phone.
customer_reviews.author: calvin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Phone broke after one day could not be fixed most disappointing
customer_reviews.author: mr r c fowler

customer_reviews.title: Sneaky. Do not buy this phone if you think ...
customer_reviews.text: Sneaky. Do not buy this phone if you think it is unlocked. It locks itself as soon as you put a sim in it. Seller has obviously not made this clear on the advert.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Spink

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was f or my daughter and she was over the moon with it
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sykes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I order an iphone and comes one box of Samsung Galaxy S5 without nothing? How is possible it?
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Untrustworthy
customer_reviews.text: Phone was locked, regardless of what it says above. Waste of money and had to sell on DO NOT BUY DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: dale p tyson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from hear!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone speaker doesn’t work and iPhone home button not working absolutely ridiculous for something that’s apparently tested!!! Don’t waste your time or money!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Come early really pleased with quality just wat it said
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great my new mobile is great I won't to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great my new mobile is great I won't to buy another one as I always have to mobiles I'm very pleased with it thank you
customer_reviews.author: wendy evans

customer_reviews.title: So let down !!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone sightly damaged, but it is defective, so disappointed , I feel really let down.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone is ok for the price still using it now love it can’t beat it

customer_reviews.title: Really looks like new and very quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and phone looks great and works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good phone, would suggest avoiding the 16GB model as it fills up very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with phone and overall service from this seller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone with great features great customer service and phone work excellent .

customer_reviews.title: amazing phone worked atonishing and the seller was a good trusted person
customer_reviews.text: amazing how it it so good can't be more proud

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy. Came In Late And It Was Full On Broken

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for amazon
customer_reviews.text: This was a genuine apple product not at apple prices. Mine came from New York. It was set to New York time but that was easily amended i just reset it to factory settings.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Laurel

iPhone 6 16GB PLEASE NOTE: This device is locked to Vodafone Ireland. Grade B- will have some signs of wear associated with light usage.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
